directions: Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne; cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa (or sauce) and water; bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 (16 ounce) jar green salsa, green enchilada sauce or taco sauce
1 (15 ounce) can pinto or kidney beans, rinsed
title: Beef and Bean Chile Verde
